detaileddescription.para: Create instance and load an image, or create an image from scratch

parameterdescription.para: Path to image file (may be omitted to create image from scratch)
Image width (is used for creating image from scratch)
If omitted - assumed equal to $width (is used for creating image from scratch)
Hex color string, array(red, green, blue) or array(red, green, blue, alpha). Where red, green, blue - integers 0-255, alpha - integer 0-127 (is used for creating image from scratch)

detaileddescription.para: This function has been deprecated and will be removed in an upcoming release. Please update your code to use the thumbnail() method instead. The arguments for both methods are exactly the same.
Rotates and/or flips an image automatically so the orientation will be correct (based on exif 'Orientation')
Best fit (proportionally resize to fit in specified width/height)
Shrink the image proportionally to fit inside a $width x $height box

parameterdescription.para: Number of times to apply the filter
Hex color string, array(red, green, blue) or array(red, green, blue, alpha). Where red, green, blue - integers 0-255, alpha - integer 0-127
Hex color string, array(red, green, blue) or array(red, green, blue, alpha). Where red, green, blue - integers 0-255, alpha - integer 0-127
Hex color string, array(red, green, blue) or array(red, green, blue, alpha). Where red, green, blue - integers 0-255, alpha - integer 0-127

detaileddescription.para: Fit to height (proportionally resize to specified height)
Fit to width (proportionally resize to specified width)
Flip an image horizontally or vertically
Get info about the original image

simplesect.para: array array( width => 320, height => 200, orientation => ['portrait', 'landscape', 'square'], exif => array(...), mime => ['image/jpeg', 'image/gif', 'image/png'], format => ['jpeg', 'gif', 'png'] )

detaileddescription.para: Load a base64 string as image
Changes the opacity level of the image

parameterdescription.para: If omitted or null - format of original file will be used, may be gif|jpg|png

detaileddescription.para: Outputs image as data base64 to use as img src

parameterdescription.para: If omitted or null - format of original file will be used, may be gif|jpg|png

detaileddescription.para: Overlay an image on top of another, works with 24-bit PNG alpha-transparency

parameterdescription.para: An image filename or a SimpleImage object
Size in pixels of each resulting block

detaileddescription.para: Resize an image to the specified dimensions

parameterdescription.para: Hex color string, array(red, green, blue) or array(red, green, blue, alpha). Where red, green, blue - integers 0-255, alpha - integer 0-127

detaileddescription.para: The resulting format will be determined by the file extension.

parameterdescription.para: If omitted - original file will be overwritten

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to get the image to as close to the provided dimensions as possible, and then crops the remaining overflow (from the center) to get the image to be the size specified. Useful for generating thumbnails.
Returns the file extension of the specified file
Get meta data of image or base64 string

parameterdescription.para: If omitted treat as a normal image

detaileddescription.para: Same as PHP's imagecopymerge() function, except preserves alpha-transparency in 24-bit PNGs
Ensures $value is always within $min and $max range.
If lower, $min is returned. If higher, $max is returned.
Converts a hex color value to its RGB equivalent

parameterdescription.para: Hex color string, array(red, green, blue) or array(red, green, blue, alpha). Where red, green, blue - integers 0-255, alpha - integer 0-127
